question:
A friend you made while you were studying abroad has written to ask you for help in finding a job in your country. You have heard about a job in a local company that might be suitable for him/her.

Write a letter to this friend. In your letter:
tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involvessay why you think the job would be suitable for him/herexplain how to apply for the jobWrite at least 150 words.
text: Hope you are doing good and the same is with me. Delighted to hear that you want to work here, in our country, India. I still remember those days which we uttered during our education in your country, USA and thought we can repatch such joyousness.

As discusssed the other day, I found a relevant job for your qualifications and hope this shall bring cheers to you. This profile includes day shift Indian Standard Time, commencing from 10:00 A.M. to evening @ 6:00 P.M. It holds lots of responsibilties, managing a team of eight members, right from the inception of the  project and should the completion has to be driven on your hands, absolutely. Even the pay is also reasonably sound according to your previous experience, which you deserve in all the ways.

Only thing is you need to do a lot of hardwork till the time you get accustomed to the situations. Moreover, as you are not of Indian origin, the weather and timings of work vary on a high mode, which requires a much of adjustment. However, I spoke to the concerned human resources manager pertaining to this, so you just need to send a mail to him and proceed with your VISA formalities.
Rest all are cool and looking forward for your reply. Hope to see you soon and All The Best!!
